text: Wilma de Faria (February 17, 1945 â€“ June 15, 2017) was a Brazilian politician. She served as the governor of the Brazilian state of Rio Grande do Norte from 2003 to 2010, the first woman to hold the position. She was a member of the Brazilian Socialist Party. Faria died on June 15, 2017 from cancer at the age of 72.Morre es-Governadora Wilma de Faria ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Politicians from Rio Grande do Norte
title: Wilma de Faria
